name: No security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to remote server administration ports
query: {securityGroups(where: {rules_SOME: {direction: "Inbound", AND: [{OR: [{sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0"}, {sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0"}]}, {OR: [{sourceFromPort_LTE: 22, sourceToPort_GTE: 22}, {sourceFromPort_LTE: 3389, sourceToPort_GTE: 3389}]}]}}) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash }}
